short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmartCover generates tailored cover letters by analyzing your CV and job descriptions, streamlining your job application process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartCover is a cutting-edge Chrome extension designed to simplify your job application process. Upload your CV, and SmartCover analyzes it using advanced AI to highlight your skills, experiences, and strengths. When browsing a LinkedIn job posting, the extension matches your profile to the job description and generates a tailored, professional cover letter in seconds. 

The personalized cover letter emphasizes your qualifications and how they align with the employer’s needs. Save time, make impactful applications, and elevate your job search with SmartCover. Seamless, efficient, and tailored to you—SmartCover is your ultimate career companion!
